dream: Ero io con M che andavamo nella zona commerciale del suo paese, in cui ho studiato,  solo che al posto dei supermercati c'era tutto un complesso super moderno, insomma uno Skyline anche se era un paesino. M mi dice "c'è da sempre" e io invece gli rispondo "no, mi ricordo che lo hanno costruito quando ero alle medie". Qui dentro trovo S e mi metto a costruire un lego. È una sorta di labirinto con le trappole e scelgo di fare un percorso insidioso e uno più breve in cui però perdi subito una vita. E per accedere a questo c'è la tipica porta ruotante dei lego con dietro lo scheletro (su cui perdo parecchio tempo a decidere che testa mettergli, se mettergli in mano qualcosa tipo una gamba, ma non ci sta in mano). Poi questo labirinto viene replicato nella realtà e c'è della gente che lo attraversa (immagino per gioco visto che c'era la questione delle vite), ma il risultato sembra un film d'azione low budget dove il protagonista fa un interpretazione falsissima di quanto sia straziato da questo percorso. Faccio per tornare a casa, ma nello shop di questo posto trovo un mio ex collega e gli dico "ma è vero che dal prossimo mese vi pagano solo 500 euro perché siete falliti?" E lui "no, spero di no". Torno a casa e ci sono i miei ex capi che stanno nascondendo un sacco di impasto per la pasta dentro ai freezer. Quindi penso che effettivamente stanno tramando qualcosa (tipo pagare con il pane anziché coi soldi). Ci diciamo qualcosa e poi non ricordo altro.
interpretation:
This dream appears to symbolize various aspects of your personal and professional life. The commercial area of your friend's town represents opportunities and growth. The modern complex replacing the supermarkets suggests newfound potential or advancements in your own life. The conversation between you and M about the construction of the complex reflects differing perspectives or memories. The presence of S and constructing a labyrinth with traps using LEGO may represent the challenges and choices you face in your life. The different paths and losing a life symbolize the risks and consequences of decision-making. The skeletal LEGO figure may indicate the need to confront fears or unresolved issues.

The replication of the labyrinth in reality with people crossing it suggests that you are observing others facing similar challenges or obstacles in their lives. The low budget action film with a poorly portrayed protagonist may symbolize feeling disconnected or misrepresented in your own struggles or emotions. This could reflect a sense of not being fully understood or acknowledged by those around you.

Encountering your ex-colleague and discussing their financial situation suggests concerns about stability or monetary issues. The mention of receiving only 500 euros and the potential failure of their business may represent anxieties about financial security or the fear of unexpected changes. The discovery of your previous bosses hiding dough in freezers implies a sense of suspicion or mistrust. It may symbolize the belief that they are scheming or engaging in unethical practices, such as using alternative means of payment. The overall theme of the dream suggests a need for caution in your personal and professional relationships, as well as the importance of navigating challenges with careful consideration.
title: Skylines and Lego Mazes: A Journey Through a Modernized Hometown

dream: In the dream all I knew was the world was ending. And the government was trying to wipe everyone out. I was one of the few still alive. They found me & shot me until they knew I was dead. I wake up reincarnated, but I still remembered everything from my past life. I notice others around me also remembered their past life. It’s like we all knew what was going on & we had to take out the government. Because the government was trying to reset everything by getting rid of everyone. It’s like the government was trying to get rid of us all & recondition the population
interpretation:
This dream suggests a sense of impending doom and a fear of losing control. The theme of the government trying to wipe out everyone reflects a fear of oppressive authority and a desire for freedom. Being shot and killed symbolizes a feeling of powerlessness or suppression in your waking life. 

Reincarnation in the dream represents a fresh start or a new perspective. Remembering your past life indicates a strong sense of self-awareness and the ability to learn from past experiences.

The presence of others who also remember their past lives suggests a collective consciousness or a shared understanding of the situation. This may symbolize a need for unity and collaboration in overcoming challenges or oppressive systems.

Overall, the dream may reflect your subconscious desire to resist oppressive forces and fight for individual rights and freedom. It suggests a need to be aware and prepared to address any threats to your personal beliefs, values, or autonomy.
title: Reincarnated Amidst an Ending World: Uniting Against a Corrupt Government

dream: My mother and I moved to another house. It was still a large nice home but I was sad we left our original house.
interpretation:
Dreams about moving to a new house often represent a significant change or transition happening in your life. In this case, the dream seems to reflect a feeling of sadness or nostalgia associated with leaving behind the familiar and comfortable aspects of your past.

The presence of your mother in the dream suggests that this change may involve a close relationship or family dynamics. Moving together can symbolize a shared experience or a collective decision to embrace a new phase in life. However, in the dream, you are expressing a sense of sadness about leaving your original house, which may indicate anxiety or reluctance about the upcoming change.

The large and nice nature of the new house could represent the potential for positive aspects in this new phase or the desire for a better living environment. However, your sadness suggests that you may be unsure about leaving your comfort zone and adjusting to the unknown.

Overall, this dream suggests that you may be feeling torn between the desire for growth and new experiences, and the nostalgia for what you have left behind. It may be valuable to explore your emotions surrounding change and discuss them with your loved ones to find a sense of balance and understanding during this transitional period.
title: The Bittersweet Resettlement: Nostalgia Lingers in our New Abode
